snippet: Investors were awaiting a speech on Friday by the Federal Reserve chairwoman, Janet Yellen, at an annual conference of central bankers in Wyoming....
abstract: Stocks drop in day of light trading.
lead_paragraph: Investors were awaiting a speech on Friday by the Federal Reserve chairwoman, Janet Yellen, at an annual conference of central bankers in Wyoming.

headline.main: Wall St. Lower After Day of Lackluster Trading
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Slips After Another Day of Lackluster Trading
